# Warnings
curl -H "Host: pda.weather.gov.hk" -H "Accept: */*" -H "User-Agent: locspc/locspc (27; OS Version 9.3.2 (Build 13F69))" -H "Accept-Language: en-HK;q=1.0,zh-HK;q=0.9" --compressed http://pda.weather.gov.hk/locspc/data/warning.xml

# Headline
curl -H "Host: pda.weather.gov.hk" -H "Accept: */*" -H "User-Agent: locspc/locspc (27; OS Version 9.3.2 (Build 13F69))" -H "Accept-Language: en-HK;q=1.0,zh-HK;q=0.9" --compressed http://pda.weather.gov.hk/locspc/data/headline.xml

# Tide Info
curl -H "Host: pda.weather.gov.hk" -H "Accept: */*" -H "User-Agent: MyObservatory/27 CFNetwork/758.4.3 Darwin/15.5.0" -H "Accept-Language: en-us" --compressed http://pda.weather.gov.hk/locspc/data/astro_tide.xml

# UV Estimate
curl -H "Host: pda.weather.gov.hk" -H "Accept: */*" -H "User-Agent: MyObservatory/27 CFNetwork/758.4.3 Darwin/15.5.0" -H "Accept-Language: en-us" --compressed http://pda.weather.gov.hk/locspc/data/fuve.xml

# General Situation Only
curl -H "Host: pda.weather.gov.hk" -H "Accept: */*" -H "User-Agent: locspc/locspc (27; OS Version 9.3.2 (Build 13F69))" -H "Accept-Language: en-HK;q=1.0,zh-HK;q=0.9" --compressed http://pda.weather.gov.hk/locspc/data/flw_wxicons.xml

# Full Forecast
curl -H "Host: pda.weather.gov.hk" -H "Accept: */*" -H "User-Agent: locspc/locspc (27; OS Version 9.3.2 (Build 13F69))" -H "Accept-Language: en-HK;q=1.0,zh-HK;q=0.9" --compressed http://pda.weather.gov.hk/locspc/data/fnd_e.xml

# 24 Hour Radiation Level
curl -H "Host: pda.weather.gov.hk" -H "Accept: */*" -H "User-Agent: MyObservatory/27 CFNetwork/758.4.3 Darwin/15.5.0" -H "Accept-Language: en-us" --compressed http://pda.weather.gov.hk/locspc/data/radiation/24hourRMN.txt

# Rain Forecast
curl -H "Host: pda.weather.gov.hk" -H "Accept: */*" -H "User-Agent: MyObservatory/27 CFNetwork/758.4.3 Darwin/15.5.0" -H "Accept-Language: en-us" --compressed http://pda.weather.gov.hk/locspc/data/rainfallnowcast/22.322_114.163.xml
